title: Adidas shares jump on buyback, profit optimism
text:
Adidas shares jump on buyback, profit optimism 12:53pm GMT - 01:15 
Shares of German sportswear firm Adidas soar after it announces a large buyback, gives an upbeat outlook for 2018 and lifts its 2020 profitability forecast, helped by rapid growth of ecommerce. Ivor Bennett reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Shares of German sportswear firm Adidas soar after it announces a large buyback, gives an upbeat outlook for 2018 and lifts its 2020 profitability forecast, helped by rapid growth of ecommerce.
